org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo Checking locale. if grep "" /etc/default/locale then echo default locale is set. else echo setting default local to en_US.UTF-8 echo "LANG=en_US.UTF-8" > /etc/default/locale fi
echo "Install wireless or WIFI related packages" sudo apt-get -y -q install wireless-tools sudo apt-get -y -q install wpasupplicant
if [ -e /lib/udev/rules.d/80-net-setup-link.rules ] then echo "Make sure to override unpredictable naming for WIFI interface - Always use wlanX" sudo ln -s /lib/udev/rules.d/80-net-setup-link.rules /etc/udev/rules.d/80-net-setup-link.rules fi
echo "Install Ethernet tools required for detecting cable plugged and unplugged events" sudo apt-get -y -q install ifplugd
echo "Set up ifplugd configuration and actions for detecting ethernet cable unplugged and plugged events" if [ -e /etc/default/ifplugd ] then sed -i 's/INTERFACES=""/INTERFACES="eth0"/g' /etc/default/ifplugd sed -i 's/-d10/-d5/g' /etc/default/ifplugd fi
if [ -e /etc/ifplugd/action.d/ifupdown ] then sed -i 's/\/sbin\/ifdown $1/ip addr flush dev $1 \&\& \/sbin\/ifdown $1/g' /etc/ifplugd/action.d/ifupdown fi
if [ -e /etc/network/if-down.d/flush-ethernet-interface-ip ] then echo "Symbolic link for flush-ethernet-interface-ip is already created" else echo "Create Symbolic link for if-down-d flush-ethernet-interface-ip" ln -s /root/chaipcr/deploy/device/flush-ethernet-interface-ip.sh /etc/network/if-down.d/flush-ethernet-interface-ip fi
if [ -e /etc/network/if-pre-up.d/flush-ethernet-interface-ip ] then echo "Symbolic link for if-pre-up-d flush-ethernet-interface-ip is already created" else echo "Create Symbolic link for flush-ethernet-interface-ip" ln -s /root/chaipcr/deploy/device/flush-ethernet-interface-ip.sh /etc/network/if-pre-up.d/flush-ethernet-interface-ip fi
if [ -e /etc/network/if-up.d/force-ethernet-up ] then echo "Symbolic link for force-ethernet-up is already created" else echo "Create Symbolic link for force-ethernet-up" ln -s /root/chaipcr/deploy/device/force-ethernet-up.sh /etc/network/if-up.d/force-ethernet-up fi
echo setting up website on ngixn if [ -e /etc/nginx/sites-available ] then echo Nginx is installed else echo Nginx is not installed exit 0 fi
cp ~/chaipcr/web/config/etc/nginx/chaipcr /etc/nginx/sites-available/ cd /etc/nginx/sites-enabled sudo ln -s ../sites-available/chaipcr rm default
cat <<EOF >> /etc/nginx/conf.d/chaipcr_unicorn.conf #Add the following to /etc/nginx/nginx.conf under the http section: # Unicorn upstream unicorn { server unix:/root/shared/sockets/unicorn.sock fail_timeout=0; } EOF
update-rc.d -f nginx defaults
